{{Infobox person |name = Richard Leaf |image = |caption = |birth_date = {{birth date and age |1967|01|01|}} |birth_place = [[U.K.]] }} '''Richard Leaf''' (born 1967) is a [[United Kingdom|British]] actor.
He has had several small parts in television and stage productions. Leaf is married to actress [[Tamsin Greig]], star of ''[[Black Books]]'', ''[[Green Wing]]'' and ''[[Love Soup]]''. The actor is notable for his role as the Governor of [[York]], nephew of [[Edward I of England|King Edward I]] in [[Mel Gibson]]'s [[Braveheart]]. He appeared as Hannibal Lecter's father in the 2007 ''[[Hannibal Rising]]'' film. He, also, appeared recently as [[Minor Ministry officials in Harry Potter#John Dawlish|John Dawlish]], an [[Auror]], in the film ''[[Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (film)|Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix]].
He is also known for his striking, almost [[translucent]] blue eyes.
